AccountId.description: The unique identifier for the Bing Ads account.

CampaignId.description: The unique identifier for the campaign.

AdGroupId.description: The unique identifier for the ad group.

TimePeriod.description: The time period for the data, formatted as date-time.

AccountNumber.description: The account number associated with the Bing Ads account.

Country.description: The country where the ad interactions occurred.

State.description: The state where the ad interactions occurred.

MetroArea.description: The metropolitan area where the ad interactions occurred.

City.description: The city where the ad interactions occurred.

ProximityTargetLocation.description: The target location for proximity targeting.

Radius.description: The radius set for proximity targeting.

LocationType.description: The type of location where the ad interactions occurred.

MostSpecificLocation.description: The most specific location where the ad interactions occurred.

AccountStatus.description: The status of the Bing Ads account.

AdGroupStatus.description: The status of the ad group.

County.description: The county where the ad interactions occurred.

PostalCode.description: The postal code of the location where the ad interactions occurred.

LocationId.description: The unique identifier for the location.

Goal.description: The goal set for the campaign.

GoalType.description: The type of goal set for the campaign.

AbsoluteTopImpressionRatePercent.description: The percentage of absolute top impressions in relation to total impressions.

TopImpressionRatePercent.description: The percentage of top impressions in relation to total impressions.

AllConversionsQualified.description: The number of qualified conversions for all interactions.

Neighborhood.description: The neighborhood where the ad interactions occurred.

ViewThroughRevenue.description: The total revenue generated from view-through conversions.

AssetGroupId.description: The unique identifier for the asset group.

AssetGroupName.description: The name of the asset group.

AssetGroupStatus.description: The status of the asset group.

CurrencyCode.description: The currency code used for reporting.

DeliveredMatchType.description: The match type of the delivered ad.

AdDistribution.description: The distribution network where the ad was displayed.

DeviceType.description: The type of device where the ad was interacted with.

Language.description: The language setting of the user interacting with the ad.

Network.description: The network used for ad distribution.

DeviceOS.description: The operating system on the device where the ad was interacted with.

TopVsOther.description: The comparison of top impressions versus other impression types.

BidMatchType.description: The match type used for bidding.

AccountName.description: The name of the Bing Ads account.

AdGroupName.description: The name of the ad group.

Impressions.description: The total number of times the ad was shown.

Spend.description: The total amount spent on ad interactions.

Assists.description: The number of assists in conversions.

ReturnOnAdSpend.description: The return on ad spend for interactions.

CostPerAssist.description: The cost incurred per assist in a conversion.

ViewThroughConversions.description: The total number of view-through conversions.

ViewThroughConversionsQualified.description: The number of qualified view-through conversions.

AllCostPerConversion.description: The cost incurred per all conversion.

AllReturnOnAdSpend.description: The return on ad spend for all interactions.

ConversionRate.description: The rate of conversions in relation to total interactions.

AveragePosition.description: The average position of the ad when shown.

AverageCpm.description: The average cost per thousand impressions.

AllConversions.description: The total number of all conversions.

AllConversionRate.description: The rate of all conversions in relation to total interactions.

AllRevenue.description: The total revenue generated from all interactions.

AllRevenuePerConversion.description: The revenue generated per all conversion.

Revenue.description: The total revenue generated from interactions.

RevenuePerAssist.description: The revenue generated per assist in a conversion.
